tool_description: Get league, team, match, tournament, item and player data.
name: Dota2
title: Dota2

api_list.name: getGameItems

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description: The language code to provide item names in.

api_list.name: getHeroes
api_list.description: A list of heroes within Dota 2.

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description: The language code to provide item names in.

api_list.name: getLeagueListing

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description: The ISO639-1 language code for the language all tokenized strings should be returned in. Not all strings have been translated to every language. If a language does not have a string, the English string will be returned instead. If this parameter is omitted the string token will be returned for the strings.

api_list.name: getLiveLeagueGames
api_list.description: A list of in-progress league matches, as well as details of that match as it unfolds.

api_list.name: getMatchDetails
getMatchHistory
api_list.description: A list of matches, filterable by various parameters.

optional_parameters.name: matchesRequested
optional_parameters.description: Amount of matches to include in results (default: 25).

optional_parameters.name: gameMode
optional_parameters.description: 0 - None 1 - All Pick 2 - Captain's Mode 3 - Random Draft 4 - Single Draft 5 - All Random  6 - Intro  7 - Diretide 8 - Reverse Captain's Mode 9 - The Greeviling 10 - Tutorial 11 - Mid Only 12 - Least Played 13 - New Player Pool 14 - Compendium Matchmaking 16 - Captain's Draft

optional_parameters.name: minPlayers
optional_parameters.description: Minimum amount of players in a match for the match to be returned.

optional_parameters.name: leagueId
optional_parameters.description: Only return matches from this league. A list of league IDs can be found via the GetLeagueListing method.

optional_parameters.name: startAtMatchId
optional_parameters.description: Start searching for matches equal to or older than this match ID.

optional_parameters.name: tournamentGamesOnly
optional_parameters.description: Whether to limit results to tournament matches. (0 = false, 1 = true)

optional_parameters.name: heroId
optional_parameters.description: A list of hero IDs can be found via the GetHeroes method.

optional_parameters.name: accountId
optional_parameters.description: 32-bit account ID.

optional_parameters.name: skill
optional_parameters.description: Skill bracket for the matches (Ignored if an account ID is specified). 0 - Any 1 - Normal 2 - High 3 - Very High

api_list.name: getMatchHistoryBySequenceNum
api_list.description: A list of matches ordered by their sequence num.

optional_parameters.name: startAtMatchSeqNum
optional_parameters.description: The match sequence number to start returning results from.

optional_parameters.name: matchesRequested
optional_parameters.description: Amount of matches to include in results (default: 25).

api_list.name: getRarities

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description: The language code to provide item names in.

api_list.name: getScheduledLeagueGames
api_list.description: A list of scheduled league games coming up.

optional_parameters.name: dateMin
optional_parameters.description: Minimal date

optional_parameters.name: dateMax
optional_parameters.description: Maximal date

api_list.name: getTeamInfoByTeamID
api_list.description: A list of all the teams set up in-game.

optional_parameters.name: startAtTeamId
optional_parameters.description: The team id to start returning results from.

optional_parameters.name: teamsRequested
optional_parameters.description: The amount of teams to return.

api_list.name: getTournamentPlayerStats
api_list.description: Stats about a particular player within a tournament.

optional_parameters.name: heroId
optional_parameters.description: A list of hero IDs can be found via the GetHeroes method.

api_list.name: getTournamentPrizePool
api_list.description: The current prizepool for specific tournaments.

optional_parameters.name: leagueId
optional_parameters.description: The ID of the league to get the prize pool of.
